participant_1.background:
I started my own photography business from home so I could listen to my music while working.
i build aquariums for a living.
i love going to concerts on the weekend.
when people do not like my social media posts , it upsets me.
I like to cook and eat Italian food on my own.

participant_2.background:
I enjoyed Comic Con with my husband last year.
I'm not allowed to have pets because I live with my parents and they are allergic.
i do not like my job.
I enjoy sharing my love of music and unicorns with others.
My hunting dog is the most valuable thing I own because he is my best friend and a loyal companion.

content.text: I went to Comic Con last year too! It was awesome.
I heard it was great! I wish I could have gone.
Maybe we can go together next year?
That would be fun! I'd love to go with someone who actually enjoys it.
I love it! I'm a big fan of comic books, anime, and video games.
Me too! I love all that stuff. I also love music and unicorns.
Oh, me too! I'm a huge music fan. I love to go to concerts.
Me too! I wish I could go to more concerts, but I don't have a lot of money.
Well, maybe we can go to a concert together sometime.
That would be great! I'd love to go to a concert with you.
Awesome! We can start planning it soon.
